name: Custom Family Timber / 11x24"
description:
A modern twist on your family tree. Ideal for families of 5 or more and short last names. Other color options available for an additional charge. Contact FontBlock for more information. • 11" W x 24" H • Birch plank (3/4" thick) • Ready to hang
To order:
 1. On checkout, add a note to seller and include your desired information. This is how. Or feel free to send your product info to the email below.
(Add hello@fontblock.com to your address book to ensure you receive our emails and they don't go to your junk folder.)
 2. We will send you an electronic proof of your
timber via email.
 3. Review your proof and respond with approval.
 4. We will print and deliver your Family Timber.

Orders take 7-10 business days for production and delivery upon proof approval.
Contact us directly for more information or questions. 317.450.3456 or hello@fontblock.com
